p: Phylogenetic analysis of the complete chloroplast genome sequence of R. potaninii and 10 species was performed through a maximum likelihood (ML) analyses with 1000 bootstrap replicates ( Figure 1), 10 species of which belonging to Sapindales order. The ML tree showed that R. potaninii was sister to R. chinensis with 100% support value, belonging to the Anacardiaceae family.
